text: Taslima Memorial Academy is a high school situated in Patharghata Upazila, Barguna District, Bangladesh. It is one of the top high schools under the Barisal Education Board. It holds the top position in Barguna District and is a semi-public institution established on January 1, 1995, by former Mayor Mallik Mohammad Ayub. Offering classes from one to ten, the school operates in two shifts: morning (starting at 7:00 am) and day (starting at 10:00 am). ==References== Category:Schools in Bangladesh Category:Barguna District
title: Taslima Memorial Academy
